solution_line_template: The two coloring books amount to {num_coloring_books} x ${coloring_book_price} = $<<{num_coloring_books}*{coloring_book_price}={coloring_books_total}>>{coloring_books_total}.
The 4 packs of peanuts amount to {num_peanut_packs} x ${peanut_pack_price} = $<<{num_peanut_packs}*{peanut_pack_price}={peanuts_total}>>{peanuts_total}.
The total cost for the coloring books and peanuts is ${coloring_books_total} + ${peanuts_total} = $<<{coloring_books_total}+{peanuts_total}={total_books_and_peanuts}>>{total_books_and_peanuts}.
